sub-events.comment: Because Construct 2 prefers -90 to 270 we add 360 to any angle less than 0 so that animations are chosen correctly.
Always want to be targeting what we're looking at.
If Player is Dead, check for First Aid Kits.
If First Aid Kit found, stop loop.
If no First Aid Kits are found, GAME OVER. Text String itself sets Pause Mode to 13.
If all Party Members Dead, GAME OVER. Text String itself sets Pause Mode to 13.

condition.name: Compare two values
condition.param: 1 + max(0, min(1, g_gamedata.At(0,0,2))) + max(0, min(1, g_gamedata.At(0,0,3)))
